title: What should I do at the age of 21, look for jobs or focus on adding up skills? - Quora

response.answer_text: This is a normal query which a young adult may have from himself and at this stage, context and phase of his life, he is utterly confused. To add to confusion, he consults those who are not competent enough to give subtle guidance. Before going further to the answer one has to keep in mind that There is neither a shortcut to success nor a way to make quick money right-away.There are immense jobs available at all levels. One needs to have those skills or competencies required for the job.You can not fit into every job available. You have to find a right slot for you wherein you get fitted with your abilities, skills or competencies.You need certain mandatory or essential qualification for the job you are looking for. In addition, having some desirable qualification, skills or competencies will always be an added value.To decide a career path is a scientific and systematic process. One has explore within, the possibilities and the path ways. Every individual has inherent strengths and inherent weaknesses. One needs to look for opportunities wherein his strengths can be suitably put to use or he can hone his skills in such a way that his weaknesses become his strengths. e.g. Someone is shy, introvert and has a fear of speaking. He can hone his motor skills to create innovative projects which may prove worthwhile. The following model may guide for exploration.  As one learns to identify issues, challenges and acting on the viable solutions; one gets fairly good ideas about himself. It helps in creating one’s model of development and “purposeful engagement”. As one keeps on exploring, applying, changing and evaluating plans; he gets fair idea about himself and potential to be put to use. One thing must be clear while looking to create one’s plan of engagement. If someone is looking for quick money, using shortcuts; this article won’t help. (the answer may be read in respective genders)

According to me, start doing both simultaneously or work on both side by side. It's time for doing some practical because you already learned too much theory part. Now explore as soon as possible because everyone is in race and do not stop until you reached your goal. We do not know who is opponent or who is on our side so be prepare yourself for every situations. By doing job you will get some real life skills or focusing on adding skills will also boost your confidence relate to your field. Sometimes you have ti think practically because theory part not working in all circumstances. You can raise your own empire by gaining knowledge about your field but for that you have to work for that or join them.👍
